Note.name: Note_3
Note.comment: FORECAST_VERSION in PP_STG_FORECAST will default to 1 for the first record entered for a given CFG_HORIZON_ID, FORECAST_DATE, FORECAST_HOUR, and CFG_UOW_ID. When a change is made to a forecast, a new record will be entered and the version incremented as well as the end_date set for the previous version.
